awards:
第35届美国制片人工会奖(2024)
　　最佳体育节目(提名)

director.name: 克里斯蒂娜·克鲁斯奥 Christina Clusiau

trans_title: 肖恩·怀特：最后一次奔跑
introduction: A revealing portrait of three-time Olympic gold medalist and one of the greatest athletes in two separate sports, snowboarding and skateboarding, Shaun White. It is a story that includes childhood struggles with a congenital heart condition, the development of his unbeatable talent, sacrifices made by his unconventional but remarkably supportive parents, the move into pro-snowboarding at a young age, and of course, his exploits at the Olympics, where he holds the record for most gold medals by a snowboarder.
chinese_title: 肖恩·怀特：最后一次奔跑
